thread.title: Sessions pushes back on Trump's 'DISGRACEFUL' tweet

title: Sessions pushes back on Trump's 'DISGRACEFUL' tweet
text:
Sessions pushes back on Trump's 'DISGRACEFUL' tweet 7:15pm GMT - 01:44 
Attorney General Jeff Sessions pushed back against criticism from President Donald Trump on Wednesday over his decision to have the Justice Department inspector general - and not prosecutors - investigate alleged surveillance abuse. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Attorney General Jeff Sessions pushed back against criticism from President Donald Trump on Wednesday over his decision to have the Justice Department inspector general - and not prosecutors - investigate alleged surveillance abuse.
